title: Headline Hub
description: HeadlineHub is a news aggregator website developed using Node.js, React, and Tailwind CSS. It features a responsive design, displaying news articles in card format. Users can filter news by category and country, and navigate through articles with pagination. The site integrates an external API for real-time news updates.

title: CampusConnect
description: CampusConnect is a UI/UX project designed to enhance university life by integrating user profiles, news feeds, resource directories, event calendars, and messaging systems. It focuses on user-centered design and responsive, intuitive interfaces.

title: Food Delivary App
description: FoodieDeliver is a UI/UX project for a food delivery app featuring user profiles, detailed menus, a shopping cart, ratings, today's offers, and seamless checkout. It emphasizes user-centered design, responsive layouts, and usability testing to enhance the food ordering and delivery experience.
